mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alert WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND checked = 0
SELECT alert_id, content, checked, sender_id, sender_name, user_id, title, type FROM alert WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY alert_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alert (content, checked, sender_id, sender_name, user_id, title, type) VALUES (#{content}, #{checked}, #{senderId}, #{senderName}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{type})
